blocks.name: ctps
blocks.content: Syntax for the class of topological spaces.

blocks.name: df-topsp
blocks.content: Define the class of topological spaces (as extensible structures). (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: istps
blocks.content: Express the predicate "is a topological space." (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))))
  eleq2i(c0, ctps, cab(hs0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))))
  df-topsp(hs0)
  elab3(hs0, c0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, ctop))
  topontop(c1, c2)
  con4i(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, universe))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(emptycls, ctop))
  0ntop()
  eleq1d(c1, ctop, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(ctopn, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, ctopn)
  eleq12d(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(ctopon, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(ctopon, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà TopSp, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2), c0 ‚àà { hs0 |(TopOpen ` hs0)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` hs0))})
  eleq2i(c0, ctps, { hs0 |(TopOpen ` hs0)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` hs0))})
  df-topsp(hs0)
  elab3(hs0, c0, (TopOpen ` hs0)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` hs0)), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2))
  syl(c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(c1, c2)
  con4i(c1 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  mtbiri(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà Top, ‚àÖ ‚àà Top)
  0ntop()
  eleq1d(c1, ctop, emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (TopOpen ` c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, ctopn)
  eleq12d((TopOpen ` hs0), (TopOn `(Base ` hs0)), c1, (TopOn ` c2), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((TopOpen ` hs0), c1, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(ctopon, (Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2))
}

blocks.name: istps2
blocks.content: Express the predicate "is a topological space." (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.)

blocks.name: tpsuni
blocks.content: The base set of a topological space. (Contributed by FL, 27-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: tpstop
blocks.content: The topology extractor on a topological space is a topology. (Contributed by FL, 27-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: tpspropd
blocks.content: A topological space depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tpspropd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c1))))
  eleq12d(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  istps(c0, cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  istps(c1, cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tpspropd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà TopSp))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ‚àà TopSp, c1 ‚àà TopSp, (TopOpen ` c0)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c0)), (TopOpen ` c1)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c1)))
  eleq12d((TopOpen ` c0), (TopOn `(Base ` c0)), (TopOpen ` c1), (TopOn `(Base ` c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(ctopon, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  istps(c0, (TopOpen ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((TopOpen ` c0))
  istps(c1, (TopOpen ` c1), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((TopOpen ` c1))
}

blocks.name: tpsprop2d
blocks.content: A topological space depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: topontopn
blocks.content: Express the predicate "is a topological space." (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: tsettps
blocks.content: If the topology component is already correctly truncated, then it forms a topological space (with the topology extractor function coming out the same as the component). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: istpsi
blocks.content: Properties that determine a topological space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.)

blocks.name: eltpsg
blocks.content: Properties that determine a topological space from a construction (using no explicit indices). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltpsg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c0)))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2))))
  eleq12d(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), cfv(cts, c2), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  2strop(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), cts, c2, c1, nat9)
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c1, c0))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  2strbas(c1, c0, c2, cts, c0, nat9)
  df-tset()
  1lt9()
  9nn()
  tsettps(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cts, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltpsg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà TopSp)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c0 > }
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà TopSp, (TopSet ` c2)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c2)))
  ibi(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (TopSet ` c2)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c2)))
  eleq12d(c0, (TopOn ` c1), (TopSet ` c2), (TopOn `(Base ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  2strop(c0, (TopOn ` c1), cts, c2, c1, nat9)
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, (Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c1 =(Base ` c2), c1 ‚àà c0)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  2strbas(c1, c0, c2, cts, c0, nat9)
  df-tset()
  1lt9()
  9nn()
  tsettps((TopSet ` c2), (Base ` c2), c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((TopSet ` c2))
}

blocks.name: eltpsi
blocks.content: Properties that determine a topological space from a construction (using no explicit indices). (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
